DOC.brief_title: Use Granulocyte Colony-stimulating Factor Treatment Recurrent Implantation Failure IVF Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator use granulocyte colony-stimulating factor ( GCSF ) treatment repeat implantation failure ( 5 cycle ) IVF patient cause unknown due thin endometrium . intend treat GCSF IVF cycle thin endometrium ( < 6 mm ) cause treatment failure , implantation window cause unknown .
DOC.criteria: 1. woman 5 failure IVF cycle cause unknown . 2. woman 5 failure IVF due thin endometrium ( < 6 mm ) unresponsive estrogen supplement . 1. history hematology disease 2. allergy GCSF 3. neutrophilia 4. severe low back pain 5. liver dysfunction 6. hyperuricemia 7. recent febrile disease pneumonia 8. rheumatoid arthritis 9. sickle cell disease
